MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: // Create the file storage client. CloudFileClient fileClient = storageAccount.createCloudFileClient();
// Get a reference to the file share CloudFileShare share = fileClient.getShareReference("sampleshare");
//Get a reference to the root directory for the share. CloudFileDirectory rootDir = share.getRootDirectoryReference();
